message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40. I think this is a great starting point.
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor. I propose a 55-45 split in your favor.  Let's close this deal and avoid further losses from inflation.
I see we're getting closer. I'm willing to compromise a bit more, but I still think I deserve the larger share. 58-42 is my new proposal.
Alice, we're losing valuable ground with each round.  I'm proposing a 52-48 split in your favor - a serious offer to finalize this before inflation eats away more of our potential gains.
